Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to a door problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
